class DynamicArray<T>

A class that represents a dynamic array

Public Functions

DynamicArray ()¶
void Add (T item)

Function: Add Adds an item of type T to DataArray

bool Contains (T item)

Function: Contains Determines whether the item of type T exists within DataArray

void Remove (T item)

Function: Remove Removes item of type T from DataArray

void RemoveAt (int index)

Function: RemoveAt Removes item of type T from index

Note*: Throws exception if index is < 0 or > length

~length refers to the field length of the class~

Properties

int Length { get; set; }

Property: length Public accessor for length variable.

ref T this[int i] {get;set;}

Operator: Indexer The public accessor for DataArray. Returns a reference to DataArray

Public Static Functions

Span<T> CreateSpan (T[] array, int start, int length)

Function: CreateSpan Creates a Span of type T from provided array from start index to provided length

void Resize<T2> (ref T2[] array, int newSize)

Function: Resize Resizes a given array of type T2 to provided newSize

void SwapIndices (Array array, int indexA, int indexB)

Function: SwapIndices Swaps position of element at indexA with position of element at indexB within the provided array
